column20: Description
This helm sure is great.
Made from the finest-quality boiled leather.
Some call it "macaroni".
It even has steel nipples for some reason.
It looks wine-stained and flamboyant.
You have to have strong legs to walk in these.
A little better than wearing socks.
Like walking on the back of a bear.
Stick them with the pointy end.
A spiky ball on a chain.
